ygData.subject: New Smith Items
ygData.msgSnippet: So what do people think of the new smith items?  I have made a sample of each and auctioned them on E Marr.  I got 3 or 4 inquiries from other smiths on how to
ygData.messageBody:
So what do people think of the new smith items? I have made a sample of
each and auctioned them on E Marr. I got 3 or 4 inquiries from other smiths
on how to make them and not a single inquiry about the price, etc. from
anyone else. The weapons cost roughly 5pp to make, BTW. I have heard the
stats are not as good as fine steel weapons. Can someone who knows the fine
steel weapon stats, post them for comparison? These are the new items:

Forged Morning Star, 1HB, 8 damage, 38 delay
1 water + 1 metal sheet + Hilt Mold + Spiked Ball Mold

Forged 2-handed Sword, 2HS, 12dmg, 44 delay
1 water + 1 metal sheet + Hilt Mold + Pommel Mold + Heavy Steel Blade Mold

Forged Bastard Sword, 1HS, 7 damage, 33 delay
1 water + 1 metal sheet + Hilt Mold + Pommel Mold + Dual Edge Blade Mold

The molds can be found off a vendor in Butcher Block, right outside of
Kaladmim. Mold prices with amiable faction and high charisma:

Dual Edge Blade Mold 1p 9g 1s 8c
Heavy Steel Blade Mold 3p 8g 3s 6c
Spiked Ball Mold 2p 5g 5s 7c
Hilt Mold 6g 3s 9c
Pommel Mold 6g 3s 9c

Any ideas on what we should charge for these? Anyone know where else the
molds can be bought or any new items we can make? I'd particularly like
confirmation on the Paladin in Solusek Ro that gives a quest for armor
molds.

Haniel the ForgeMaster, E Marr
